arts.ttl: Huddersfield shock Leicester as Sheffield Wednesday set up Yorkshire derby in Carabao Cup
arts.sum: Nicholls made two stops in the shootout against Leicester

arts.ttl: Carabao Cup: Huddersfield stun Leicester in shootout drama, Birmingham beat Blades
arts.sum: Goalkeeper Lee Nicholls stars for League One side Jay Stansfield strikes late for Birmingham victory The goalkeeper Lee Nicholls was the hero for Huddersfield, who overcame Championship opponents Leicester via a penalty shootout after an entertaining 2-2 Carabao Cup first-round draw at the League One clubâ€™s Accu Stadium. Huddersfield started strongly and Ruben Roosken and David Kasumu both had strong penalty shouts turned down early on after both appeared to be tripped inside the box. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Carabao Cup draw live: Man United and Premier League clubs to discover second-round opponents
arts.sum: 11 Premier League clubs join those who have progressed from the first round
